TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but the fire burned the inside of your throght and you slowly starve to death from starvation.

I wish for it to rain bacon

Granted but the bacon is covered with Corrosive Acid.

I Wish to be Derpy Hooves.

Granted, but you get picked up on the street by the police and get taken to a ranch that sells you to a guy who's secretly into bestiality.

I wish for a very own mini-SRB that I can pet and care for.

Granted but your strapped to the end and it takes you into orbit and well you don't live

I wish I was immortal

Granted, but you have an old and crippled body that has to lie in bed all today and can't move.

I wish I could go to space...

granted, but without an EVA suit, your blood boils inside you and you asphyxiate.

I wish i had a space resistant bulldog.

Granted, but your bulldog becomes an astronaut , subsequently destroying your lifetime dream.

I wish I could eat cookies without actually eating them.

Granted, but since the wish is nonsense you are subjected to GLADOS' deadly pools of acid filled with cookies at the bottom.

I wish that NASA would get a better budget.

Granted but they spend it on a rover that crash lands, wasting all the money

i wish docking was implemented in ksp

Granted, there is a mod, but its not user friendly.

I wish for a planet.

Granted, but it happens to be orbiting a black hole just outside the event horizon.

I wish for a hug

Granted, but the hugger has spiky arms.

I wish for a Dr pepper.

Granted, but he forged his medical license

I wish that I had a supercomputer

Granted, but it flies off to save the world from some impending disaster (with its underpants on outside its trousers)

I wish that I had a PUPPY

It shows up in a sealed container.

I wish I had a stationary supercomputer

You got it, but the coolant is also stationary....

I wish I had some scissors to open this sealed container!

Granted, but you cut your hand trying to get into the container

I wish I had a good wish to wish
Granted, but you have to think of it yourself. I wish for the Death Star to orbit kerbin.

Granted, but is blows Kerbin to pieces and goes on to blow up Duna as well.

I wish for a better computer.

Granted, but you can never own another computer, and it is only just faster than your current one.

i wish for cake.

Granted, but it is filled with dead kerbanoughts (think I spelled that right)

I wish for the secrets to life.

Granted, but you find that there are no secrets to life so you have wasted your wish.

I wish to fly.

Granted, but this means you now have embarrassing fluffy wings sticking out of your back.

I wish I was the President of the World.

Granted, Mr. Breen.

I wish for it to be 1952, and always be that way.

Granted, but 1952 is a leap year and you live in a universe where the number 29 causes a black hole

I wish for a ksp mod which adds MOAR BOOSTERS!!!
